body: If this Transpose node is a fanin of other nodes in the graph, you can't delete it. You can check this with NodeMap::GetOutputs. Could you add two test cases, one for this "not cacenllable" case (is a fanin for other nodes) and one for the cancelable case (is not fanin for other nodes)?
body_html: If this Transpose node is a fanin of other nodes in the graph, you can't delete it. You can check this with NodeMap::GetOutputs. Could you add two test cases, one for this "not cacenllable" case (is a fanin for other nodes) and one for the cancelable case (is not fanin for other nodes)?
body_text: If this Transpose node is a fanin of other nodes in the graph, you can't delete it. You can check this with NodeMap::GetOutputs. Could you add two test cases, one for this "not cacenllable" case (is a fanin for other nodes) and one for the cancelable case (is not fanin for other nodes)?
